summary: The module implements a collection of fast unit tests for the Stable Diffusion XL ControlNet pipeline with Plug‑and‑Play (PAG) capabilities, using lightweight dummy models and inputs to verify configuration handling, enable/disable behavior, unconditional generation, and optional component persistence.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the PAG‑enabled ControlNet pipeline for SDXL, providing automated regression testing to support reliable product development and release.
